drupalNodeEvent.title: Governing the Urban in China and India

field_speakers.processed: Xuefei Ren (Professor of Sociology and Global Urban Studies, Michigan State University)

field_organizers.processed: Lieberthal-Rogel Center for Chinese Studies, University of Michigan

field_description.processed: Based on her recently published book, Dr. Ren will talk about the different ways that China and India govern their cities and how this impacts their residents.
